column2: Difficulty with motivation to achieve goals. A potential lack of self-confidence to set personal goals. A general lack of enthusiasm and a tendency to feel overwhelmed by change.

Highly motivated with many goals and aspirations for the future. Vital and spontaneous, enjoying the challenge of new and adventurous paths. Irrepressible enthusiasm. A weakness lies in a tendency to exaggerate and an inability to cope with mundane activities.
Difficulty coping with the realities of everyday life. Practical daily chores seem overwhelming, with difficulty concentrating on matters at hand.

Practical, efficient, and hands-on. A reliable, common-sense approach to most matters. A down-to-earth manner well-suited for the daily chores of life. A weakness lies in a sometimes stubborn refusal to make changes. A tendency to stifle personal enthusiasm and that of others.
A lack of objectivityâ€”the ability to view life from a detached and rational perspective. Difficulty making decisions and weighing pros and cons in a logical manner.

Objective and philosophical, preferring to view life from an intellectual perspective. A rational mind that outweighs feelings, viewing the world of emotions as irrational. A high sense of fairness and a logical thought process. A weakness lies in viewing emotions in a disparaging light.

Out of kilter with emotions. The thought of crying or losing composure in front of others is horrifying. A frequent lack of compassion in relationships, and difficulty honoring personal feelings and those of others.

Speaking from the heart; compassionate and caring with a strong intuitional nature. Valuing personal relationships, often taking on a caretaker role. A sympathetic and understanding nature that can lead to a nurturing role toward loved ones. A weakness lies in a failure to take an objective perspective when necessary. A tendency to react without first thinking things through.
